nodes.bodyText:
good that you removed unused fields
we should still validate the values are non null, as they are not validated otherwise (even implicitly) before the ctor returns
please also move below logger, and add a blank line after static field
perhaps you can make the fields private too
nit: separate fields from constants with new line
Do we want to add requireNotNull check here?

commit.message:
Minor cleanup of BigQuery connector

- Remove unused method and field
- Add missing final and static
- Add missing requireNonNull
- Rename method and variable
- Fix typo
- Use Slice.toStringUtf8 method

afterCommit.message:
Minor cleanup of BigQuery connector

- Remove unused method and field
- Add missing final and static
- Add missing requireNonNull
